dict.acceptation: 平安渡过， 挨过；[地]使风化；

sent.orig: Weather Wonderland of Hong Kong - Contains weather information, news about meteorology, and weather archives.
sent.trans: 香港的天气仙境-包含天气信息，关于气象学的新闻，和天气档案。

sent.orig: To provide weather forecasts and warnings of hazardous weather, Observatory maintains a close meteorological watch round-the-clock.
sent.trans: 为了提供天气预报及恶劣天气警告，天文台不分昼夜，密切进行气象观测。

sent.orig: Automatic update of weather forecast is the key feature of Weather Nokia Series 60 software.
sent.trans: 自动更新天气预报是这个软件的主要特性。

sent.orig: The weather forecast is always out of whack with the weather we actually get.
sent.trans: 天气预报总与实际的天气情况不一致。

sent.orig: Recently, weather abnormal there days, sometimes the weather forecast is not prospective a little.
sent.trans: 最近天气有些不正常，天气预报有时也不是很准。
